#include "stdio.h"
#include "stdlib.h"

int GetMin(int a, int b)
{
	if (a < b)
	{
		return a;
	}
	else
	{
		return b;
	}
}

int main(int argc, char* argv[])
{
	int count = 0;
	scanf("%d", &count);

	while (count--)
	{
		int total, men, women, children, selmen, selwomen, selchild;
		total = men = women = children = selmen = selwomen = selchild = 0;
		
		scanf("%d %d %d %d", &total, &men, &women, &children);

		int actwomen = GetMin(men * 2, women); 
		int actchild = GetMin((men + actwomen) * 4, children);
		
		selchild = GetMin(total * (0.8), actchild); 
		total = total - selchild;

		selwomen = GetMin(total * float((float)2/(float)3), actwomen);
		total =  total - selwomen;

		selmen = GetMin(total, men);

		printf("%d %d %d\n", selmen, selwomen, selchild);		
	}

	return 0;
}
